bicycles.general_description: This is the speediest, smoothest, best handling, finest performing aluminum race bike on the planet.
bicycles.extras: Ultralight SmartForm C1 Premium Alloy Frame w/ full carbon fork. Shimano 105 hydraulic disc group / Cannondale 1 crank

bicycles.general_description: The all-new SuperSix EVO destroys expectations. So light, so fast, and so aero, it defies logic. This is a machine built to make you faster everywhere. Speed has evolved. Thrivesto the red zone, the pointy end, the podium
bicycles.extras: Lightweight, low-drag SuperSix EVO carbon frameset, the ideal blend of speed, handling and comfort. Ultegra Di2 electronic 12-speed - Shimano's penultimate high-performance road group

bicycles.general_description: Fast, composed and reliable. With stable handling, precise handling, robust Shimano shifting and durable DT Swiss aluminum wheels, the Grail CF SL 7 is ready to race.
bicycles.extras: The CP0045 carbon cockpit offers ideal hand positions for both ergonomic and aggressive driving.

bicycles.general_description: Featuring the latest Tiagra system for precise shifting, class-leading light weight and Endurace's signature relaxed geometry, this aluminum Endurace bike is built to last.
bicycles.extras: None

bicycles.general_description: Featuring the latest Tiagra system for precise shifting, class-leading light weight and Endurace's signature relaxed geometry, this aluminum Endurace bike is built to last.
bicycles.extras: None

bicycles.general_description: Incredible comfort. Precise Shimano 105 Di2 electronic shifting. Robust, reliable parts. Go the distance with the Endurace CF 7 Di2, a carbon endurance bike built to go further, faster.
bicycles.extras: None

bicycles.general_description: The Madone SLR 9 Gen 8 is built to dominate the road with the advantage of low weight and aerodynamic speed.It’s built with our cutting-edge 900 Series OCLV Carbon, which is not only incredibly light, but also features aerodynamic shapes to dominate descents and flat roads. Ultralight IsoFlow frame technology makes the Madone comfortable without sacrificing comfort.
bicycles.extras: This bike is tuned from the ground up to win with a cutting-edge Shimano Dura-Ace Di2 drivetrain, carbon wheels, an integrated Trek Aero RSL handlebar/stem, and RSL Aero water bottles and bottle cage to further reduce drag.

bicycles.general_description: The Madone SLR 7 AXS Gen 8 is an ultralight, highly aerodynamic road bike built for racing. Its 900 Series OCLV Carbon frame is aerodynamic and lightweight, so you can fly up climbs. IsoFlow lightweight frame technology means Madone doesn’t compromise comfort for speed. To give you the ultimate aerodynamic advantage, the Madone SLR includes RSL Aero bottle cages and mounts that further reduce drag.
bicycles.extras: This build comes ready to win, equipped with a high-performance SRAM Force AXS D2 drivetrain with power meter, carbon wheels, and a one-piece carbon Trek Aero RSL handlebar/stem.

bicycles.general_description: Working during the week, partying on the weekend, let our everyday champion add some excitement to your daily routine. Ready for all weather conditions with a 15kg load capacity thanks to the Fender Rack system.
bicycles.extras: 55Nm max TORQUE helps you tackle steep terrain, while the 400Wh battery, along with an optional 250Wh PowerMore range extender (available separately), make big days off the grid a reality.

bicycles.general_description: Class-leading stiffness-to-weight ratio, full system integration and complete adaptability. The Grail CFR is a complete gravel race bike built to win on the highest stages.
bicycles.extras: We designed the Grail CFR frame to be as efficient as possible. Using the most advanced materials shaves 118g off the equivalent CF SLX frame to help you achieve the lightest race setup.

bicycles.general_description: The Checkmate SLR 7 AXS is a gravel race bike designed to line up at the start and kick up dust on long, rough trails. To give you the performance you want on race day, the Checkmate combines a lightweight aerodynamic design with IsoSpeed ​​and new Gravel Race Geometry that keeps you ready to attack without wasting your energy.
bicycles.extras: It’s equipped with a SRAM Force XPLR AXS wireless drivetrain, carbon wheels, and a Trek Aero RSL handlebar/stem for a lightweight package.

bicycles.general_description: An amazingly capable, versatile gravel road bike. Built for chasing horizons, exploring routes less travelled or accelerating your commute.
bicycles.extras: Lightweight SmartForm C2 Alloy frame w/ full carbon fork. Shimano GRX 400 10-speed gravel group. WTB ST i23 TCS rims.

bicycles.general_description: The most playful Grizl:ON in the family, our mountain bike-inspired build features SRAM Transmission mullet shifting, wireless dropper post control, and the added traction of larger volume tires. Become a cycling hero without the gear.
bicycles.extras: With just 4kg between the motor and battery, the Grizl:ON keeps the fun going on the trails. 55Nm of peak torque helps you traverse steep terrain, while the 400Wh battery, together with an optional 250Wh PowerMore range extender,

bicycles.general_description: Lightweight and ready for the rough stuff. With the super-light SLX frame and latest-generation Rudy Ultimate fork, this is one of the fastest and most capable bikes on tough gravel trails.
bicycles.extras: Mounts for GPS, lights, bags, doorbells and more.

bicycles.general_description: SuperX LAB71 stands at the apex of gravel racing performance. Built on the ultra-lightweight Series 0 carbon frame with Proportional Response construction, this bike transforms raw power into unrelenting speed. SRAM’s RED XPLR AXS drivetrain with integrated power meter delivers razor-sharp shifting, while Reserve 40|44 GR wheels and Vittoria Terreno 700x40c tires provide race-day precision and control.
bicycles.extras: Aerodynamic SystemBar R-One cockpit and integrated cable routing.

bicycles.general_description: This is a bike for tough, demanding rides that won't break the bank. A solid aluminum frame with FOX suspension and Magura brakes complete this smart build.
bicycles.extras: Relaxed head tube angle (LO) of 63.5° and seat tube angle (HI) of 78°.

bicycles.general_description: With its long reach, flat head angle, wide-rimmed tires, and 120mm of travel, it's an extraordinary downcountry bike that climbs fast and offers plenty of speed and capability on the descents.
bicycles.extras: Responsive Lux Trail suspension.

bicycles.general_description: We designed this Enduro bike for adrenaline-pumping races and fast climbs on technical courses. All of this was made possible by the latest generation Shapeshifter technology with geometry adjustment.
bicycles.extras: Experience the refined elegance of this bike’s hidden premium design, engineered to showcase its advanced unidirectional carbon frame. By revealing the complex carbon structure, we’ve reduced weight and created a distinctive, textured aesthetic.

bicycles.general_description: The Torque Mullet CF 9 is built for freeriding. It dominates big jumps, loves fun side jumps, and lives for the biggest jumps in the bike park. The carbon fiber frame and top-shelf components create a dream bike package. It’s the perfect combination of speed, durability, and agility.
bicycles.extras: Choose from two positions: LO (low) and HI (high). We ship the Torque in the LO setting. When you turn the chip 180°, the head angle and seat tube angle increase by 0.5° (64° and 78° respectively), and the bottom bracket height increases by 8mm for more ground clearance and direct control.

bicycles.general_description: The best hardtail deserves the best fork. With its unique single-sided design, the ultralight Lefty Ocho Carbon delivers 110mm of the smoothest, most precise front suspension on the market – because better control equals more speed.
bicycles.extras: Ultralight Hi-MOD carbon frame, with Proportional Response size-specific geometry. 110mm Lefty Ocho Carbon – the smoothest, most precise-handling XC fork in the world

bicycles.general_description: Hard-hitting capability and flawless performance with a compact motor. If you're looking for a bike that loves to pedal hard, you've found it.
bicycles.extras: We’ve combined the lightest, smoothest, and quietest drivetrain available with Spectral:ONfly’s next-generation carbon chassis.

bicycles.general_description: From trail sessions to off-road adventures, our most affordable electric mountain bike does it all, without breaking a sweat. A rugged alloy electric hardtail that’s ready for anything with the latest Bosch motor and a large, high-capacity 600/800 Wh battery.
bicycles.extras: None.

bicycles.general_description: Fast rolling tires, 7-speed gearing and confident, stable handling make this a seriously fun, high-performance street machine.
bicycles.extras: None.

bicycles.general_description: The traction and comfort of its big plus-size tires and its light, agile feel make the Trail Plus 20 the best way to learn trail riding skills with fewer spills.
bicycles.extras: None.

bicycles.general_description: The big grippy tires, powerful hydraulic brakes, and wide-range gearing of this premium package will take your little charger's trail riding to the next level.
bicycles.extras: None.

bicycles.general_description: With 20” wheels and easy-pedaling gearing, this bike is made to build speed and confidence everywhere from the street to the pump track.
bicycles.extras: None.

bicycles.general_description: A bike that will turn every journey, path and road into a joyride. Its comfort-focused frame and upright riding position keep the effort low, and enjoyment high.
bicycles.extras: None.

bicycles.general_description: An urban-adventure bike for cities and town pathways, open countryside and everything else. Expand your horizons on one bike to do it all.
bicycles.extras: None.

bicycles.general_description: An urban-adventure bike for cities and town pathways, open countryside and everything else. Expand your horizons on one bike to do it all.
bicycles.extras: None.

bicycles.general_description: Inside this potent urban e-bike lies the wild and rugged heart of an explorer. With huge range, robust components, and grippy mixed-surface tires, the Tesoro is built to get you to it all week, and away from it all on the weekend.
bicycles.extras: Powered by Bosch’s CX motor and an 800Wh battery, this bike is all about getting you where you want to go—fast.

bicycles.general_description: A swift, sporty bike that’s perfect for getting a workout, city cruising or just getting out and feeling good.
bicycles.extras: None.

bicycles.general_description: A bike for any day and anywhere. Fun and light to rip around the neighborhood for meet ups, running errands or Sunday fun days.
bicycles.extras: None.

bicycles.general_description: Start planning that epic off-road bike ride you’ve always dreamed of with this powerful, comfortable and capable electric touring bike. Ride hard all day with powerful Bosch motor support and a long-range 750 Wh battery.
bicycles.extras: Range up to: 150 km.

bicycles.general_description: Sharp, light, fast, and practical, this is simply the ultimate high-performance commuter e-bike.
bicycles.extras: Light and silent Bosch SX drive system, with a 400Wh battery. Wireless electronic SRAM Eagle 12-speed shifting.

bicycles.general_description: Float through the city. Fly through the woods. The new Moterra EQ can do it all. It’s where boundless off-road capability meets serious everyday utility.
bicycles.extras: Shimano XT/Deore 12-speed drivetrain / Lights, rack, fenders, kickstand.

bicycles.general_description: With a powerful electric drive unit and features for comfort, durability, and practicality, all roads are yours on Synapse Neo Allroad.
bicycles.extras: Lightweight carbon-fiber construction and proven endurance race geometry.

tasks.description: Use Vite to create a basic React app
Install React Router and setup routes
Create a form with 5 input fields
